summary.description:
Dietary Intakes of Vegetable Protein, Folate, and Vitamins B-6 and B-12 Are Partially Correlated with Physical Functioning of Dutch Older Adults Using Copula Graphical Models.

Structure Learning with Copula Graphical Model.

Statistical tool for learning the structure of direct associations among variables for continuous data, discrete data and mixed discrete-continuous data. The package is based on the copula graphical model in Behrouzi and Wit (2017) <doi:10.1111/rssc.12287>
summary.name: nutriNetwork
